item.description:
A  model shoot featuring Lily

Lily is an excellent model with a lot of experience. If you visit the photo section, you will see photos of Lily taken at a previous event.

Here is an opportunity to improve your studio & glamour photography skills and add to your portfolio. Lily will be modeling a couple of different outfits.   The fee must be paid in advance. To ensure each attendee has enough time to shoot, we are limiting this event to 5 photographers.

 

This event will go from 7:00PM - 9:00PM.  Traffic in the area of the studio can be heavy at this time. Please be on time.

 

This photo shoot is for photographers who have some experience shooting in a studio.

However, we may elect to allow those with little/no studio experience to attend, depending on the response. Please email  us to let us know you are interested.

Additional requirements:

1) Your dSLR needs to have a hot shoe that can trigger a pocket wizard, or you have a PC sync jack on your camera, or you have a pop up flash

2) You know how to put your camera into manual mode so you can adjust shutter speed and aperture independently

3) For your pop up flash, you know how to set that to manual output, lowest setting, typically 1/128 power

4) You know how to select flash white balance Recommended lens focal length: 50 mm or higher on a full frame, 35mm or higher on a cropped frame sensor, and ISO 200

Notes:

- You may bring your own Pocket Wizard, but only one photographer can use the lights at a time.

- Please remember to charge your camera batteries the evening before. Please be sure to bring sufficient memory cards.

 

Type of photography: Casual. Glamour or Fashion.

 

Please contact us if you have any questions.
item.name: Photoshoot w/Lily
